languages.text: "Я уже давно не чувствую боли. Но твое тело точно будет страдать. Прими эту боль, сживись с ней, и она станет твоим спасением даже в самые темные дни".
"I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."
languages.original_text: "Я уже давно не чувствую боли. Но твое тело точно будет страдать. Прими эту боль, сживись с ней, и она станет твоим спасением даже в самые темные дни".

traits.locale_text: "It has been long since I last felt pain. But your body will suffer. Embrace the pain, make it part of you, and it will become your salvation even on your darkest days."
"It has been long since I last felt pain. But your body will suffer. Embrace the pain, make it part of you, and it will become your salvation even on your darkest days."
"I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."
"I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."
"I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."
"I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."

languages.text: «Hace mucho tiempo que no siento ningún dolor. Pero sí, ciertamente su cuerpo sufrirá. Acepte el dolor, conviértalo en algo suyo. Será su salvación incluso en su hora más aciaga».
languages.original_text: "I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."

traits.locale_text: «Hace mucho tiempo que no siento ningún dolor. Pero sí, ciertamente su cuerpo sufrirá. Acepte el dolor, conviértalo en algo suyo. Será su salvación incluso en su hora más aciaga».

languages.text: 「長い間、痛みを感じることはなかったの。でも、そうね、あなたの体は苦痛を感じるでしょうね。痛みを受け入れて、自分の一部にするの。それが、暗黒の日々においてあなたの救いとなるわ」
languages.original_text: "I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."

traits.locale_text: 「長い間、痛みを感じることはなかったの。でも、そうね、あなたの体は苦痛を感じるでしょうね。痛みを受け入れて、自分の一部にするの。それが、暗黒の日々においてあなたの救いとなるわ」

languages.text: “我已经很久都没有感到过疼痛了。不过，是这样的，它会给你的身体带来痛苦。拥抱痛苦，让它成为你的一部分吧。这样一来，当你深陷黑暗之中时，它将会为你带来救赎。”
languages.original_text: "I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."

traits.locale_text: “我已经很久都没有感到过疼痛了。不过，是这样的，它会给你的身体带来痛苦。拥抱痛苦，让它成为你的一部分吧。这样一来，当你深陷黑暗之中时，它将会为你带来救赎。”

languages.text: "Ich habe seit Langem keinen Schmerz mehr gespürt. Aber ja, Euer Körper wird mit Sicherheit leiden. Nehmt den Schmerz an und macht ihn zu einem Teil von Euch. Er wird Eure Erlösung sein, selbst in Euren dunkelsten Stunden."
languages.original_text: "I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe seit Langem keinen Schmerz mehr gespürt. Aber ja, Euer Körper wird mit Sicherheit leiden. Nehmt den Schmerz an und macht ihn zu einem Teil von Euch. Er wird Eure Erlösung sein, selbst in Euren dunkelsten Stunden."

languages.text: « Cela fait bien longtemps que je n'ai pas ressenti la douleur. Mais oui, vous allez sans doute souffrir. Accueillez cette sensation et acceptez-la pleinement. Ce sera votre planche de salut dans vos heures les plus sombres. »
languages.original_text: "I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."

traits.locale_text: « Cela fait bien longtemps que je n'ai pas ressenti la douleur. Mais oui, vous allez sans doute souffrir. Accueillez cette sensation et acceptez-la pleinement. Ce sera votre planche de salut dans vos heures les plus sombres. »

languages.original_text: "I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."

languages.text: "Ben acı hissetmeyeli uzun zaman oldu. Fakat evet, bedenin muhakkak ızdırap çekecek. Bu acıyı bağrına bas, bir parçan olsun. En kara gününde bile kurtuluşun olur."
languages.original_text: "I have not felt pain in a long time. But yes, your body will certainly suffer. Embrace the pain, and make it a part of you. It will be your salvation even on your darkest days."
